##Univariate Analysis

  - Simplest form of analyzing data.
  - Focuses in analyzing only one variable at a time.
  - Descrpictive statistics of univariate analysis:
    - central tendency (mean, mode, median)
    - dispersion (range, variance, maximum, minimum, quartiles -IQR-)
    - Standard deviation
  - Visualization:
    - Frequency distribution tables.
    - Bar charts
    - Histograms
    - Frequency polygons
    - Pie charts
